name: LD Double Feature: D'pur & Deepir
description:
Two games in one! Guide these two brothers D'pur & Deepir, shovels in hand, into the deep unknown.  They automatically take turns moving, so all you have to do is point them in the right direction (far away from rocks and trees). 

Use WSAD to change the direction of the active brother.

Programming & Art: John Chapman

Music & Sound: Lucas Ciarlante
